      • ckeckRook

        private static boolean ckeckRook(int rookX,
                                 int rookY,
                                 int kingX,
                                 IGameField gameField)
        Check if there a unmoved rook for the castling and if the field are free between rook and king.
        Parameters:
        rookX - The x-position of the rook
        rookY - The y-position of the rook
        kingX - The x-position of the king.
        gameField - the actual game field
        Returns:
        true if a castling is possible. It is not checked if the fields are save.

      • isItAValidMove

        public boolean isItAValidMove(Move move)
        Check for a figure if it is a valid move. This not only check if he can hit the king. It not check if the king is after this in check.
        Specified by:
        isItAValidMove in interface IMoveHandler
        Parameters:
        move - The move which should be check.
        Returns:
